publicationStmt.p: Published as part of ELTE Verskorpusz

div.head: IX. KOLOSTORBA!
div.p: ...laeta quod pubes hedera virenti gaudeat pulla magis atque myrto, aridas frondes hiemis sodali dedicet Euro.
